chapter.title: Release History
chapter.para: This is the overview of the different releases.

itemizedlist.listitem: Complete code review with loads of bugfixes.
Cleaned up the user interface of the weblog application and added extra features such as cross linking.
Added the isModified method to YDForm.
Added the YDDatabaseTree class.
Added the YDFormElement_Img class.
Added the isElement method to YDForm.
The YD_FW_REVISION constant is now available in the templates.
Added YDFormElement::isForm that returns the form name of the element.
YDMysqlDump version 1.1. Support for comments and custom export.
Added optional caching to the public pages of the weblog.
Added the YD_WEBLOG_CACHE_PREFIX and YD_WEBLOG_CACHE_SUFFIX constants.
Updated Smarty to version 2.6.12.
Added YDFormElement_Date to handle all combinations of date/time/datetime selects.

Added the escape and escapeSql to YDDatabase drivers and YDDatabaseQuery drivers. The string and sqlString methods are deprecated and they will display a warning to use the new methods instead. Updated the examples and the YDWeblogAPI.
Added YDXml as a wrapper of the phpdomxml package with a few additions, like toArray and loadArray.
The YDFSImage::saveThumbnail function now returns the YDFSImage object for the thumbnail.
Added the toArray function to YDBase.

The ID attribute for form elements is now set by default to the name of the form, followed by an underscore and then followed by the name of the form element (the same as the value of the form elements name attribute in HTML).
Fixed YDRequest::redirect when under IIS.
Added YD_CRLFs to the html form renderer.
Added setTotal and showTotal to YDGraphPie addon.
Added validation rules maxlength_escape, minlength_escape and rangelength_escape.
Added XML form renderer/importer.
Added YDArrayUtil::implode.
Added YDInstaller addon.
Added a patch to HttpClient when 302 redirecting to foreign domains.
Added the YDStringUtil::startsWith and YDStringUtil::endsWith functions.
Added the $failOnError option to the YDDatabaseDriver classes.
The SQL statements that are logged now include filename and line number.
Added a query cache and the _fromNodeArray and _toNodeArray functions to YDDatabaseTree.
Removed the support for PATH_INFO variables from YDRequest::getActionName.
Added YDRecordSet::setTotalRows.
Added YDFormElement_TextAreaCounter.
Added YDConfig var YD_AUTO_EXECUTE to YDF2_process.php to make YDExecutor extensible.
Added option for persistent sorting in recordsets.
Added the checkboxgroup form element.
Added YDForm::getErrors() that returns all active error messages.
Added YDForm::getName() that returns the form name.
Added the form name to the form array.
Added constant YD_DIR_HOME_ADD that holds the path to the addons directory.

Added $success parameter to YDDatabaseObject::_executeCallbacks that indicates if the callback action was successfull (true), not successfull (false) or not executed (null). This parameter will be passed to the callbacks functions as a third parameter.

Added YDDatabaseObject::resetObject that unsets all object variables, fields and non-fields variables leaving the ones that start with underscore. YDDatabaseObject::resetValues only unset fields and select variables. Updated YDDatabaseObject::reset to call resetObject instead of resetValues.
New YDFormElement::setOption method to change an element option.
Added a very basic spam protection to the comments function in the weblog.
YDAjax v2.0.
Added the strip_html filter to YDForm.
Added the YDRequest::getQueryStringParameter and YDRequest::getQueryStringParameterAsInt functions.
Added the YDDatabaseTree::setSortField function.
Added the YDGuidUtil class.
Added YDDatabaseObject::getColumn - request #1731.
Added comparison feature to protected fields in YDDatabaseObject - request #1732.
Added config YD_TEMPLATE_DIR to YDTemplate - request #1727.
Made a lot of performance improvements and bug fixes.
Added the weblog example application.
Improved the date/time form elements.
Improved the YDDatabaseObject class.
The YDForm::getValue and YDForm::getValues now return additional information.
Added the YDFSDirectory::has function.
Added the YDBrowserInfo::getBrowserLanguagesAndCountries function.
Added the YDBrowserInfo::getBrowserLanguagesAndCountries function.
Added an option to create addons for the framework.
Added the maxwords and minwords validation rules.
Added an option to mark fields as mandatory.
Added support for raw values for compound form elements.
Added the i_in_array and i_not_in_array validation rules.
Added the errors_unique_messages property to the array version of a form.
Added the YDFSDirectory::getFilesRecursively function.
Added a way to register custom database drivers with YDDatabase.
Added the YDGraph addon.
Added the YDXMLForm addon.
Added the YDMysqlDump addon.
Added the YD_FW_COPYRIGHT constant.
Added the IP form rule.
Added the setDefault function to the YDForm class.
Added a function to YDRequest to get the current URL without the query string.
Added the YDFSFile::getBaseNameNoExt function.
Added the YDUrl::merge function.
Added sorting options to the YDFSDirectory->getContents function.
Added support for callbacks in YDDatabaseObject when default actions are executed.
Added getDefaults, getDefault and getModifiedValues to YDForm.
Added the utf8_decode form filter.
Added the utf8_decode form filter.
Added an option to the YDFSFile constructor to force the creation of a file if it doesn't exist.
Added the getDatabase, getUser, getPassword, getHost and getOptions methods to the YDDatabaseDriver class.
Added an example on using AJAX with the Yellow Duck Framework.
Added support for drivers in YDSqlQuery.
Added the getDriver method to all database drivers.
Added the YDDate class.
Added the YDStringUtil::ipcmp function.
Added the set, exists and get functions to the YDBase class.
Added the YDStringUtil::encodeToAscii function.
Added YDDateFormat class to YDDate.php to define and change formats more easily.
Added sorting options to the YDRecordSet class.
Added the getLastUrl and getFirstUrl functions to YDRecordSet.
Added several new functions to the YDFileSystem classes.
Added the YDFSDirectory::getSize function.
Added the YDEncryption class that implements a simple encryption mechanism.
Added the YDPersistent class.
Added the YDFSFile::rename and added the inline option to YDFSFile::download.
Added support for PHP templates.
The YDFSImage class now uses it's own logic to create thumbnails instead of using phpThumb.
Added YDFormElement_Span class.
Added the clear methods to YDEmail and fixed the setSMTP method.
Added the import feature to YDForm.
Added a script to automatically make builds of releases and revisions.
Replaced SmartyLight with the full blown Smarty template engine
Brand new documentation based on DocBook XML/XSL. We now have HTML and PDF documentation.
Completely reworked YDEmail class which is now powered by phpMailer.
Added the possibility to do logging to a file using the YDLog module
Added the YDSqlQuery class which gives you an object oriented way of creating SQL queries

Fixed a whole number of bugs in the validation rules and added quite a number of new validation rules. The following rules were added:
character digit in_array not_in_array exact
Implemented recordset paging using the YDDatabaseDriver::getRecordsAsSet function returning a YDRecordSet object.
Added the possibility to change URLs with the YDUrl class.
Added the YDPath module containing a whole number of frequently-used path operations.
YDDebugUtil can now output as HTML
The YDTimer class now supports markers
Removed our custom template caching in favor of the Smarty caching functions
Documented the YDCart class
Added the delete and setContents functions to the YDFSFile and YDFSDirectory classes
Removed the deprecated YDTemplate::assignObject function. You should use YDTemplate::assign instead.
Renamed the constants in the YDEmail class so that they start with "YD_" instead of with "YD".
Fixed a number of bugs in the YDStringUtil::formatFilesize function
Added: YDStringUtil::normalizeNewlines
Added: YDStringUtil::removeWhiteSpace
Documented the YDStringUtil class
Removed the YDFSFile::toArray, YDFSImage::toArray and YDFSDirectory::toArray functions.
Removed the YDBase::toArray functions.
Removed the YDDatabase class constructor.
Added a new feature to YDForm: compare rules.
Added the executeDelete function to the YDDatabaseDriver class.
Improved the scripts for building the documentation.
Added the FAQ and Appendix C (How to build documentation) to the user guide.
The YDBrowserInfo class now recognizes FireFox as a separate browser.
Added an option to specify a template outside the template directory (as smarty supports it).
The debug function now use YD_CRLF instead of \n for the newline characters.
The logging functions are now able to wordwrap long lines if you define YD_LOG_WRAPLINES. This is off by default.
Fixed some bugs in the defaults for the YDValidateRules functions.
The YDForm::getValue and YDForm::getValues function now include a timestamp for date/time elements
The date/time form elements now can use an array as the default value as well as an integer.
Added the following methods to the YDBase class: getClassName, hasMethod, isSubClass, getAncestors, serialize
Added the YDConfig class that hold global configuration parameters.
The defaults for date/time elements can now be strings, integers, numeric values or integers
The setDefaults function can now be called before, during or after adding the elements
Added the YDLocale module which is a compatibility layer on top of the set_locale function
The YDFileSystem classes now have a move option to move the file/directory to a different place
Added the YDStringUtil::formatDate function
Reorganized the examples index
Added the removeElement function to the form class.
Added the label_html and error_html elements to the YDForm::toArray function result.
Added ignore patterns and class filters to the YDFSDirectory::getContents function.
Improved the speed of both the YDBBCode class and the YDStringUtil::encodeString functions.
Added the YDFormElement_DateSelect, YDFormElement_DateTimeSelect and YDFormElement_TimeSelect form elements.
Added support for null values in update and insert SQL statements in the YDDatabaseDriver class.
Added the YDImport function to include parts of the Yellow Duck Framework instead of relying on the include function from PHP.
Added the getBasename and getAbsolutepath functions to the YDFSDirectory class.
Added the createDirectory function to the YDFSDirectory class.
Added the YDCart class that describes a shopping cart.
Added the deleteDirectory function to the YDFSDirectory class.
Added license information to the Yellow Duck Framework.
Added the download function to the YDFSFile class which forces the browser to download the file.
Fixed a huge number of smaller bugs (more info in the changelog)
We are now sponsered by Red Carpet Host
The documentation is now completed.
Added options to log debugging info and log messages to a file.
Much nicer layout for some of the internal index pages and the index page of the examples.
Release history instead of the build logs.
Updated phpThumb to version 1.4.6.
YDFSDirectory::getContents is able to return custom objects now.
Removed the build directory as it was not needed anymore.
YDDatabaseDriver_mysql is no longer a separate include file, which increases performance (as most people tend to use MySQL? anyway).
The API of YDBrowserInfo was updated and it's now part of the YDUtil.php include file.
The template class is refactored and is no longer automatically instantiated with each request. Also caching is working fine now. An example for caching was added as well.
The Smarty Light libraries are updated to 2.2.0.
Added conditional HTTP using etags to the YDFeedCreator module (description)
Caching needs to be done with only a cache ID and not a filename (but both should be possible).
Switch from Smarty to Smarty Light for the template engine.
PHP 5 compatible, but doesn't yet take advantage of the new features.
All features from the underlying template engine are now available in the YDTemplate class.
Added constant YD_CRLF which contains the end of line appropriate for the current platform.
First public beta version
Internal only version
